item.title: On the Emperor's New Mind
item.description: Finally finished reading Roger Penrose’s classic book “The Emperor’s New Mind: Concerning Computers, Minds and The Laws of Physics”. As a junior Ph.D. student who hopes to have a career in the research of artificial intelligence (machine learning or deep learning more precisely), I was reading this book as a touch on the opposite of the belief that intelligence is achievable by machines. Apart from several of his dramatic tones towards mocking A.
